name: Ground Control to Major Tom (School Ver.)
name_original: Ground Control to Major Tom (School Ver.)
description:
Grammatically corrected version of my school project where I explore making a visual novel with narrative design research. Will be expanded in the future.

From my school's readme:

Ground Control to Major Tom Narrative Game

mechanics: Camaraderie, Exploration

Music and other art by me.

Font: https://www.dafont.com/nasalization.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
